loggedin:
Please be aware this control bypasses software locks, and any scheduled use. If a remote user is trying to operate the telescope, instructions sent here will interfere with them - this should only be used for diagnostic and test purposes.
Software checks on door status, daylight, weather are all bypassed.
no_javascript_text:
This page is shown because the script on the previous page has failed to run.

This could be due to either a failure in the script, or your browser has javascript disabled.
warning:
Logging in gives access to an INDI client which directly controls the robotic telescope.
Please be aware this control bypasses any scheduled use. If a remote user is trying to operate the telescope, instructions sent here will interfere with them - this should only be used for diagnostic and test purposes.
Software checks on door status, daylight, weather are all bypassed.
Please ensure the telescope is safe to operate.

You can access image files saved on this unit without logging in. Follow this link:
welcome_text:
SKIPOLE +-->

Well done!
This is the home page of your new project with template page ident 4001.

The template page 4001 is held in a 'restricted' folder, and to access it the client browser calls /index which leads to a 'NoOperation' Responder (ident 1), which in turn passes the call to this template page.  You could delete the Responder and set another, such as a 'SubmitData' Responder which will call your submit_data function if you wish to dynamically insert data into this template.

This template page has been set with an "error_messages.ErrorPara" widget as its 'default error widget' - normally hidden, but will be displayed if an error condition is raised leading to this page.

This text is set in a TextBlock with reference 'welcome_text' - your next step is to call /skiadmin and edit the body of page 4001 to remove the TextBlock and add your own content.
